de.weltraumschaf.dht.id

Class NodeId

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.dht.id.NodeId

  • public final class NodeId
extends Object
    System wide unique node id. A node should generate a new node on each start up to join the network with.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private UUID id
      Holds the UUID.

        Dedicated constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • asString

        public String asString()
        Returns the standardized string format.

        Example: f07bb8b7-cdf9-4731-8992-d538dc3abc0b

        Returns:
        never null or empty

      • asInteger

        public BigInteger asInteger()
        Returns the id as 128 bit integer.
        Returns:
        never null, always new instance

        Creates a new random id.
        Returns:
        never null, always new instance
